title: CannaTech Conference Series With Mark Goldhar: Google Doesn't Exist yet in the cannabis space
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Mark Goldhar, a member of CannaTech’s financial advisory board with vast experience as an entrepreneur and executive in the cannabis space, talked with Rena Sherbill about the future of the industry, barriers to legalization and what investors in the cannabis sector should be focused on. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
